attributes.action: The Police must comply with the law  - stop people cycling on the pavement.
attributes.additional_details: They are a danger to the young and old.
attributes.background: Insturct the Police to issue compulsory fines

rejection.details:
Enforcement of crime is a matter for the police.

If you are not happy with how the police are tackling cycling offences in your area, you could contact your local Police and Crime Commissioner. You can do so here: https://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
